definition: generic term for birds and animals/birds/to capture (old)
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
birds and animals/the beasts of the field and the birds of the air
worse than a beast/to behave immorally
lit. dressed up animal (idiom)/fig. immoral and despicable person
a fine bird chooses a tree to nest in (proverb)/fig. a talented person chooses a patron of integrity
Ratitae (formerly Cursores) flightless birds such as ostriches

sentences.english: Poultrymanure is different from many sources of industry pollution with its fertility.
sentences.chinese: 禽粪便同许多工业污染源不同，其中含有丰富的肥源。

sentences.english: Initial investigations into the source of her infection suggest exposure at a live bird market.
sentences.chinese: 感染源初步调查显示，病人曾到过活禽市场。

sentences.english: Chicks can pick up oocysts both indoors and on pasture.
sentences.chinese: 禽可以捡食户外或者牧场上的卵囊。

sentences.english: Newcastle disease is one of poultry infectious diseases caused by Newcastle disease virus.
sentences.chinese: 新城疫是由新城疫病毒引起的禽传染性疾病。

sentences.english: Heat tolerance can be increased by incorporating major genes that reduce feather cover on the body.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过加入减少禽只羽毛的主要基因提高耐热性。

sentences.english: Look at these birds, do you know they fall in love with each other at first sight.
sentences.chinese: 你看那鸿雁飞过声声鸣，卿可知此鸟乃是恩爱禽。

sentences.english: Long mountain birds, is produced in the Long Hill pointed out that the parrot.
sentences.chinese: 陇山禽，是指出产于陇山的鹦鹉。

sentences.english: To understand the "Long Mountain birds, " the meaning of the poem is very easy to understand.
sentences.chinese: 明白了“陇山禽”的含义，这首诗就很容易理解了。

definition: raccoon dog (Nyctereutes procyonoides)/raccoon of North China, Korea and Japan (Japanese: tanuki)/also pr. [hao2]
